content: May 8 (Gracenote) - Results for Stage 3, Giro d Italia on Monday. Stage 3 Vasto to Melfi, 213 km, Road race. Overall leader Remco Evenepoel BEL (Soudal - Quick-Step) Stage winners 1 Michael Matthews AUS (Team Jayco - AlUla) 2 Mads Pedersen DEN (Trek - Segafredo) 3 Kaden Groves AUS (Alpecin - Deceuninck) Following stages : May 9-Stage 4 Venosa to Lago Laceno, 175 km, Road race. May 10-Stage 5 Atripalda to Salerno, 171 km, Road race. May 11-Stage 6 Naples to Naples, 162 km, Road race. May 12-Stage 7 Capua to Gran Sasso d'Italia, 218 km, Road race. May 13-Stage 8 Terni to Fossombrone, 207 km, Road race. May 14-Stage 9 Savignano sul Rubicone to Cesena, 35 km, Individual time trial. May 16-Stage 10 Scandiano to Viareggio, 196 km, Road race. May 17-Stage 11 Camaiore to Tortona, 219 km, Road race. May 18-Stage 12 Bra to Rivoli, 179 km, Road race. May 19-Stage 13 Borgofranco d'Ivrea to Crans-Montana, 207 km, Road race. May 20-Stage 14 Sierre to Cassano Magnago, 194 km, Road race. May 21-Stage 15 Seregno to Bergamo, 195 km, Road race. May 23-Stage 16 Sabbio Chiese to Monte Bondone, 203 km, Road race. May 24-Stage 17 Pergine Valsugana to Caorle, 197 km, Road race. May 25-Stage 18 Oderzo to Val di Zoldo, 161 km, Road race. May 26-Stage 19 Longarone to Tre Cime di Lavaredo, 183 km, Road race. May 27-Stage 20 Tarvisio to Monte Lussari, 18.6 km, Individual time trial. May 28-Stage 21 Rome to Rome, 126 km, Road race.
